xdi2.core.security.signature.validate

Interface AESSignatureValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignatureValidator<AESSignature>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAESSignatureValidator, AESAgentSecretKeySignatureValidator, AESGraphSecretKeySignatureValidator, AESSecretKeySignatureValidator, AESStaticSecretKeySignatureValidator

    public interface AESSignatureValidator
extends SignatureValidator<AESSignature>
    This is a SignatureValidator that can validate an XDI AESSignature.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface xdi2.core.security.signature.validate.SignatureValidator

        canValidate, validateSignature, validateSignature
